item.title: Main Deck Cargo Compartment Fire Detection System (All Cargo Configuration) Loops – Both Loops Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided procedures are established and used to ensure associated compartment remains empty.

numlitem.para: Ensure the Load Supervisor or authorized personnel has signed the load manifest. This signature indicates that the load planning system has accounted for any aircraft load restriction resulting from the inoperative equipment and that the aircraft has been loaded in accordance with all UPS weight and balance limitations.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to MAIN CARGO FIRE Light "BOTH MAIN CARGO FIRE LOOPS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
